question: The first edition of National Youth Parliament Festival was held in which year?
explanation:
The first National Youth Parliament Festival (NYPF) was organised from in February 2019 at District, State and National levels.
The second edition of the festival was launched in the month of December 2020. After District and State-level events, the final event was held recently Central Hall of Parliament. Youth between 18 to 25 years will speak before the National jury and out of them, three will be declared winners.
